definitions.title: Pi. denom.
definitions.body: do a third time, devide into three parts, etc.;—Pf. 2 ms. [[וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֫]] De 19:3 divide land into three parts (so Impf. [[וַיְשַׁלֵּשׁ אֶת־הָעָם]] [for MT [[וַיְשַׁלַּח]]] 2Sa 18:2 LXXL Bu); 1Sa 20:19 stay three days (cf. Dr); v:1Sa 20:20 We Dr al. (cf. LXX) read ´[[אֲשַׁלֵּשׁ בַּ]]: (for ´[[שְׁלשֶׁת חַ]]:) = I will shoot on the third day with the arrows (HPS qu.); Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיְשַׁלֵָּשׁוּ]] 1Ki 18:34, and Imv. mpl. [[שַׁלֵָּשׁוּ]] v:1Ki 18:34 do a third time.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְשֻׁלָּשׁ]] three years old Ge 15:9 + 1Sa 1:24 (read with LXX Th We etc. [[בְּפַר מְשֻׁלָּשׁ]] for [[בְּפָרִם שְׁלשָׁה]]), f. [[מְשֻׁלֶּשֶׁת]] Ge 15:9, Ge 15:9; [[הַחוּט הַמְשֻׁלָּשׁ]] Ec 4:12 the threefold cord; fgl. [[מְשֻׁלָּשׁוֹת]] Ez Eze 42:6 three-storied  chambers.
